${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Managing your own Private Optical Network Want to build your own private network but not sure how to manage it? We have the answer. Enterprises need a management system that will allow you to MANAGE:
- Multi-vendor & multi-domain software for complete fault, performance and inventory management. - A single-pane-of-glass provides a complete network wide view and consistent look and feel for managing all network elements. - Network discovery and change detection to provide real time and accurate network snapshot management systems. - Automated, node-specific analysis enables you to isolate trouble at the root cause. - Get live fault, topology, performance in a single common view with the Circuit Analysis Tool. - Easily pinpoint problems across your multi-vendor/multi-domain network with reporting and analysis.
Explore the one management system for all your needs by watching the next installment <[[http://lightriver.nokia.pages.services/lightriver-nokia-campaign]]> of the Nokia and LightRiver webinar series.
